Uses of Package
org.ferris.tweial.console.twitter

  • Packages that use org.ferris.tweial.console.twitter 
    Package Description
    org.ferris.tweial.console.main  
    org.ferris.tweial.console.preferences  
    org.ferris.tweial.console.twitter  
  • Classes in org.ferris.tweial.console.twitter used by org.ferris.tweial.console.main 
    Class and Description
    TweetRetrievalEvent
    This event supports the data needed during the tweet retrieval process to determine which tweets, if any, will emailed to the user.
  • Classes in org.ferris.tweial.console.twitter used by org.ferris.tweial.console.preferences 
    Class and Description
    TweetRetrievalEvent
    This event supports the data needed during the tweet retrieval process to determine which tweets, if any, will emailed to the user.
  • Classes in org.ferris.tweial.console.twitter used by org.ferris.tweial.console.twitter 
    Class and Description
    TweetRetrievalEvent
    This event supports the data needed during the tweet retrieval process to determine which tweets, if any, will emailed to the user.
    TwitterAccount
    This class represent the authentication information needed to access a user's Twitter account.
    TwitterBuilder 
    TwitterCacheFile
    This is a hard coded File object to "DataDirectory/tweets-cache.ser".
    TwitterDataSource
    The purpose of this class is to provide a small abstraction to how Twitter is getting its data.
    TwitterHandler
    This class handles dealing with Twitter data
    TwitterPage
    This is the consoles view for Twitter related information.
    TwitterPropertiesFile
    This is a hard coded AbstractPropertiesFile object to "ConfigurationDirectory/twitter.properties"
